message: Let's split the money 60/40. It's a fair deal that lets us both benefit.
I think a 60/40 split in my favor is fair, given that inflation will hurt Alice more than me. Let's get this done quickly!
Bob, I understand the advantage you have with inflation, but your previous offer was far too low.  Let's meet in the middle with a 55/45 split. This ensures we both walk away with a decent amount.
Alice, I'm willing to compromise.  Let's go with a 55/45 split in my favor, given the inflation disadvantage you're facing.  It's a fair deal for both of us.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering a 50/50 split to end this now.  Any further attempts to exploit the inflation situation will just waste time and lead to us both losing out.
